hero.title: Your Child's Development is Our Mission
hero.subtitle: Speech therapy, psychology, special education, and school preparation. Experienced teachers, individual approach, visible results.

about.text: School Kids is a place where every child reveals their potential. We work with children from age 2 and help them develop harmoniously through individual and group classes.

items.name: Special Education
items.desc: Support for children with special needs

items.title: Convenient Schedule
items.text: Flexible hours from 9 AM to 7 PM

testimonial: Thank you for helping our son! In just a few months, his speech improved significantly.

footer.text: Your child's development is an investment in their future

aboutPage.title: About School Kids
aboutPage.description: School Kids - a modern child development center in Karaganda. Our mission is to help every child reveal their potential through professional approach and care.
aboutPage.hero: We created a space where every child can develop in a comfortable atmosphere with the support of experienced specialists

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Help children reveal their potential through professional approach, modern methods and individual care. We believe that every child is unique and deserves careful attention to their developmental characteristics.

logopeds.title: Speech Therapists
logopeds.text: Certified specialists with 5+ years of experience. Regularly take advanced training courses and implement modern speech correction techniques.

psychologists.title: Psychologists
psychologists.text: Child psychologists specializing in work with preschool and early school-age children. Gentle approach and deep understanding of child psychology.

defectologists.title: Special Educators
defectologists.text: Specialists in corrective pedagogy with medical background. Work with children with developmental needs using proven methods.

teachers.title: Teachers
teachers.text: Experienced school preparation instructors. Use game-based learning methods making the process engaging and effective for children.

items.title: Individual Approach
items.text: Each child receives a personalized development program

items.title: Professionalism
items.text: We work only with qualified specialists

items.title: Comfort and Safety
items.text: We create a comfortable atmosphere for classes and development

items.title: Results
items.text: We monitor progress and adjust programs to achieve goals

cta.title: Come for a Free Consultation
cta.subtitle: Meet our team, ask questions and get recommendations for your child's development

servicesPage.title: Services and Programs
servicesPage.subtitle: Professional help in your child's development. Individual approach and modern methods.

services.title: Speech Therapy
services.fullDescription: Professional help in sound correction, speech development and overcoming speech disorders. We work with children from age 3.

services.title: Child Psychologist
services.fullDescription: Help children solve emotional and behavioral problems, develop social skills, work with fears and anxiety.

services.title: Special Education
services.fullDescription: Comprehensive work with children who have developmental needs. Individual approach and modern corrective methods.

services.title: School Preparation
services.description: Comprehensive program for future first graders
services.fullDescription: Comprehensive school preparation: reading, writing, math, logical thinking and attention development.

services.title: Group Classes
services.fullDescription: Classes in small groups (up to 6 children) for social skills development, creative abilities and school preparation.

benefits.title: Benefits of Classes at School Kids

items.title: Experienced Specialists
items.description: Certified teachers with 5+ years of experience

consultation.title: Not Sure Where to Start?
consultation.subtitle: Come for a free consultation. Our specialists will conduct an assessment and recommend the optimal class program.

contactsPage.title: Contact
contactsPage.subtitle: Get in touch with us in a convenient way. We will respond within 15 minutes during business hours.

contactInfo.title: Contact Us
contactInfo.quickAnswer: We respond within 15 minutes during business hours

form.title: Leave a Request
form.subtitle: Fill out the form and we will contact you soon
